pages.text: Bernese Mountain Dogs are large, fluffy dogs originally used for cattle herding.$(br2)Standing just over a block tall and coming in two different coats, these dogs can make great companions!
Example of a Bernese Mountain Dog

Bernese Mountain Dogs can be found most commonly in open areas near hills and mountains, such as savannas and  meadows. You can also find them in various windswept biomes and, more rarely, open plains.

Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Bacon Treat.
